column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I remembered the first long train trip i had , it was incredible .
#id=2
#text=I was talking to my family about going on a trip to Virginia and they decided it was about time we booked the trip .
#id=3
#text=My dad called Amtrak -LRB- train company -RRB- and ordered 5 tickets for the next weekend .
#id=4
#text=When the weekend came we got onto the train .
#id=5
#text=This train was different , it was a double-decker or a train with two floors .
#id=6
#text=We got to our seats and to the side was huge windows that went from the back of the train car to the front .
#id=7
#text=I could n't believe how incredible all the trees and birds looked .
#id=8
#text=Then we got to the observation car .
#id=9
#text=I did n't even think this type of car existed .
#text=The train car was all class except for the floor and the lower parts of the wall , above was all glass .
#text=Then we rode in the observation and watched as the rain fell down .
#text=It was an unbelievable event and I would highly recommend it .
